name: Sales Hub Microapp Template
description:
Give your Sales team the best chance to win


Empower sales teams to close deals faster! This free sales hub template contains everything they need in one place, from company announcements, training, product brochure, competitions, leadership, resources, and more. With this template, you can enable teams to learn quickly and keep them motivated to make more sales. Add videos, embed websites, image galleries, scrolling, and interaction in Tiled. You can easily swap your logo and add your brand colors and typography. Publish and share your microapp in no time.


You can experience what your next company overview could look like here.


You can find the Tiled plugin here.
